author: julianfoad
msg: Add some doc strings in the test suite.

author: lgo
msg: ra_serf: Fix issue #3212: use the snapshot mechanism of serf 0.3 to keep
REPORT request bodies in memory until we're sure that we don't have to resend
(setup_request): If we're not using the delegate mechanism, take and/or
restore a snapshot of the body bucket to reuse it later when a request has
(handle_response): If we had set a snapshot on the body buckets, we have to
destroy the bucket here correctly, so make sure all exit paths pass through
the cleanup section. Only exception is when we have to resend the request.

author: blair
msg: Style tweak, put the return types of functions on their own line.

author: hwright
msg: Simplify the metadata table API by using a NULL value to delete a key
